channel.title: dbt Cloud Release Notes
channel.description: dbt provides release notes for dbt Cloud so you can see recent and historical changes.
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2023 dbt Labs™, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Private packages must be cloned using access tokens provided by environment variables
item.description: Private GitHub packages must be cloned using access tokens provided by environment variables.

item.title: Threads default value changed to 4
item.description: Threads now default to 4 users' profile.

item.title: Creating a new job no longer triggers a run by default
item.description: You need to click **Run on schedule** before a job will be scheduled to run

item.title: New IDE features and classic IDE deprecation
item.description: Enhancement and Deprecation: Extra features in new IDE, and classic IDE deprecation

item.title: The dbt Cloud + Databricks experience is getting even better
item.description: The dbt-databricks adapter is now available for use with dbt Cloud

item.title: Enhancement: New Cloud IDE launch
item.description: Enhancement: New Cloud IDE launch

item.title: Announcing dbt Cloud’s native integration with Azure DevOps
item.description: dbt Cloud native integration with Azure DevOps

item.title: Query the previous three months of data using the metadata API
item.description: Metadata API data retention limits

item.title: List Steps API endpoint deprecation warning
item.description: List Steps API deprecation

item.title: Enhancement: Support for cross-database sources on Redshift RA3 instances
item.description: Adding support for cross-database queries for RA3

item.title: Enhancement: New Cloud IDE beta
item.description: Adding IDE performance and reliability improvements

item.title: Enhancement: Large DAG feature
item.description: Add a render button to visualize large DAGs

item.title: Refresh expired access tokens in the IDE when using GitLab
item.description: Adding support for expiring OAuth access tokens.

item.title: Credentials no longer accidentally wiped when editing an environment
item.description: Credentials are now saved when editing an environment.

item.title: Audit log
item.description: Review actions performed by people in your organization.

item.title: Email verification
item.description: dbt Cloud users created via SAML JIT will now confirm identity via email to activate their account.

item.title: Scheduler performance improvements
item.description: scheduler, which has much faster prep times, especially at the top of the hour.

item.title: Spotty internet issues no longer cause a session time out message
item.description: We fixed an issue where a spotty internet connection could cause the “IDE session timed out” message to appear unexpectedly. People using a VPN were most likely to see this issue.

item.title: Dividing queue time into waiting and prep time
item.description: dbt Cloud now shows waiting time and prep time for a run.

item.title: Service tokens and bug fixes
item.description: Service tokens can now be assigned granular permissions to enforce least privilege access.

item.title: DAG updates and performance improvements
item.description: Clicking a node in the DAG opens a model or config file in new tab in the IDE.

item.title: Autocomplete snippets for SQL and YAML files in IDE
item.description: Autocomplete snippets for SQL and YAML files in IDE

item.title: Model timing for Multi-tenant Team and Enterprise accounts
item.description: Model timing is now available for Multi-tenant Team and Enterprise accounts, plus performance improvements.

item.title: Changelog 2021
item.description: 2021 Changelog for the dbt Cloud application

item.title: Changelog 2019 and 2020
item.description: 2019 and 2020 Changelog for the dbt Cloud application
